1.caption_en:
A blank "USER BEHAVIOUR 5.0" platform-design canvas for mapping stakeholder roles, frictions, rules, incentives/penalties and governance across four journey stages: Onboarding, Match, Transact/Interact and Engage. It includes a stakeholder circle, vertical rules and behaviour strips (promote/penalize arrows), and labeled rows for friction, alternatives and governance.

{
  "type": "template",
  "title": "USER BEHAVIOUR 5.0",
  "version": "5.0",
  "language": "en",
  "purpose": "Platform user behaviour mapping canvas for designing rules, incentives, penalties and governance across user journey stages",
  "layout": {
    "columns": [
      "Onboarding",
      "Match",
      "Transact / Interact",
      "Engage"
    ],
    "rows": [
      "Stakeholder (circle area)",
      "Friction / Hurdles",
      "Stakeholder Behaviour (Promote / Penalize)",
      "Alternatives",
      "Governance Activities",
      "Rules & Norms"
    ],
    "orientation": "landscape",
    "grid": "4 columns x multiple rows with a prominent middle horizontal flow arrow"
  },
  "visual_elements": [
    {
      "type": "circle",
      "label": "STAKEHOLDER",
      "position": "top-left"
    },
    {
      "type": "horizontal_arrow_sequence",
      "labels": [
        "ONBOARDING",
        "MATCH",
        "TRANSACT / INTERACT",
        "ENGAGE"
      ],
      "position": "center_horizontal"
    },
    {
      "type": "vertical_strip",
      "label": "RULES & NORMS",
      "position": "left_of_center"
    },
    {
      "type": "vertical_label_with_arrows",
      "label": "STAKEHOLDER BEHAVIOUR",
      "arrows": [
        {
          "direction": "up",
          "label": "PROMOTE",
          "color": "green"
        },
        {
          "direction": "down",
          "label": "PENALIZE",
          "color": "red"
        }
      ],
      "position": "left_center"
    },
    {
      "type": "footer_bar",
      "labels": [
        "PIK",
        "USER BEHAVIOUR 5.0",
        "fastbreak.one"
      ],
      "position": "bottom"
    }
  ],
  "text_snippets": [
    "What are required rules & normes of your platform for the main process steps? (eg. for registration, upload-filter, interaction, payment ...)",
    "STAKEHOLDER",
    "FRICTION / HURDLES",
    "What are the biggest hurdles for the stakeholder while using your platform?",
    "Which behaviour of the stakeholder you want to promote?",
    "Which behaviour of the stakeholder you want to panalize?",
    "ALTERNATIVES",
    "What is necessary to effectively implement, monitor and maintain the desired behaviour?",
    "How can you prevent bad behaviour?",
    "USER BEHAVIOUR 5.0"
  ],
  "intended_use": "Workshop tool for platform designers to map stakeholder behaviours, incentives, penalties and governance across the user journey",
  "source": {
    "project": "Platform Innovation Kit",
    "creator": "fastbreak.one",
    "license": "CC (as shown on image)"
  },
  "colors": {
    "primary": "#2f4d56",
    "accent_promote": "#8fc241",
    "accent_penalize": "#e05a58"
  },
  "contains_placeholders": true
}
